name: dprdf2
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0

stmt.origin: mpbid(w0, wf(c0, c1, cfv(csubg, c2)), wf(c0, cdm(c0), cfv(csubg, c2)))

body.origin:

⊢ (w0 →(c0 : c1 →(SubGrp ` c2)))

stmt.origin: feq2d(c0, cdm(c0), cfv(csubg, c2), c1, w0)
